a: Absolutely! Chronicle uses top-tier encryption and security protocols to keep your reflections safe and private.

q: Can I categorize my journal entries?
a: Yes! Chronicle allows you to organize your entries using folders, collections, and custom tags. You can also filter them by date, mood, or category.

q: How does mood tracking work in Chronicle?
a: You can tag each entry with a mood, and Chronicle provides insightful analytics with visual charts to help you understand your emotional journey.
Yes! Chronicle is fully responsive and works seamlessly on all devices. A dedicated mobile app is also in development!

q: Can I customize my journal's appearance?
a: Yes! Chronicle lets you personalize your journaling experience with different themes, fonts, and layouts to match your style.
Yes! Chronicle allows you to share specific journal entries with trusted friends or mentors while keeping the rest private.
